text: (nabiyē!) movun bhūmiyehi saṁcāraya kaḷē nædda? (saṁcāraya kara tibuṇē nam), movunṭa pera visūvangē avasānaya kesē vūvēda yanna dæka ganu æta. (pera visū) ovun nam, śaktiyenda, bhūmiyehi athæra damā giya (purāṇa) saḷakuṇu valinda, movunṭa vaḍā balasampannayan vaśayenma siṭiyaha. (ehet) ovungē pāpayanhi hētuven ovunva allāh allā gattēya. allāhgē (grahaṇayen) ovunva bērā gænīmaṭa kisivekut siṭiyē næta
